name: Xtreme Stunt Biker 2 Pro
description:
Bike Racing Adventure Game is the BEST and MOST POPULAR free racing game ever and most addictive and real world physics based based game to makes best practice of ride and drift.This Adventure Game has fast pace control over the speed and advanced power brakes.Enjoy very attractive and beautifully designed bike and tracks.
Bike Racing Adventure Game provides variety of helmet and bike drivers skins and super sport bike design.There are several type of racing tracks like desert,sea,road,hills and mount racing tracks.Its a bit to hard and super interesting game.By regular practice of Bike Racing Adventure Game improves your controlling power and drift skills and finally you will get a real experience of rinding.This bike racing game has many extreme bike with burning tires.
Feature-

Realistic bike physics to play.
Extremely responsive accelerometer.
Extremely smooth tilt controls.
Large verity of bike skin and racing tracks.
Street racing option available.
Suitable for all kind of genres kids,boys,men,women,girls.
Tap left side of bike for power brakes and tap right side for accelerometer.
if you likes Road Rash then you are going to love Bike Racing Adventure Game
Choose difference racing tracks.
Ultra smooth and high resolution of graphics.
Bike racing provided you a sharp 3D simulation experience.
Many amazing and adventurous bike unlocked without coins or in app purchase
